duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze healthcare industry processes, billing systems, and revenue cycle management functions to identify opportunities for improvement and efficiency.
Lead business analysis efforts, gather requirements, and develop solutions for complex healthcare business challenges.
Interact with clients to understand their needs, convey technical information, and support project success through effective communication.
Develop comprehensive workflow models, business rules, and requirement documents to guide IT development efforts.
Utilize project management methodologies to define business and technology requirements, support project lifecycles, and ensure high-quality results.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a related field (Master's preferred)
Certification or progress toward certification highly preferred and encouraged
